      • getServices

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getServices()
        Gives all registered services.
        Returns:
        a Set with all registered services.

      • calculateResultForService

        public void calculateResultForService(java.lang.String service,
                             java.lang.String[] args)
        Runs the calculation algorithm of the give service and saves the result as json in the database.
        Parameters:
        service - the service.
        args - arguments for the service.

      • existService

        public boolean existService(java.lang.String service)
        Checks if a service is registered to the service manager.
        Parameters:
        service - a String with the service name.
        Returns:
        true if the service is registered. False if not.

      • getResultForService

        public org.json.JSONObject getResultForService(java.lang.String service)
        Gives the Result for a service. Returns it as json. The json could be empty if the service never calculated a result.
        Parameters:
        service - the service.
        Returns:
        a json with the result of the service.
